name: Crowded Room
description:
It is a game about a crowded room full of yourselves.

I didn't have enough time for this LD, but I certainly didn't want to completely pass it up. So this is a simple idea that I put together in a couple of hours. It's barely a prototype

In the game, your aim is to get to the exit as much as possible. If you touch the boundaries or your past-selves, the game is over.

Controls: WASD to control your character, Space to respawn.
